name: Biting Winds
flavor_text: "The Fallen describe Darkness as a gale. A force of nature, arising suddenly, from seemingly nowhere." —The Exo Stranger

frame.name: Precision Frame
frame.description:
Compound Bow. Longer draw time optimized for damage. 
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

perks.description:
Durable yet light bowstring.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Agile Bowstring

perks.description:
Stable, high-friction bowstring.
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Tactile String

perks.description:
Excellent snapback.
  •  Decreases accuracy
  •  Faster draw time
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Elastic String

perks.description:
Light and easy to draw.
  •  Slightly faster draw time
  •  Slightly decreases accuracy
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Flexible String

perks.description:
Tightly strung bow.
  •  Greatly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly slower draw time
  •  Slightly decreases stability
perks.name: High Tension String

perks.description:
Simple balanced string.
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Natural String

perks.description:
Unbreakable bowstring.
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly faster draw time
perks.name: Polymer String

perks.description:
Light and stable shaft material. 
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Carbon Arrow Shaft

perks.description:
Thinner arrows to increase nocking speed and weapon handling.
  •  Increases handling speed 
  •  Increases reload speed
perks.name: Compact Arrow Shaft

perks.description:
Heavy and consistent. 
  •  Greatly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly decreases stability
perks.name: Fiberglass Arrow Shaft

perks.description:
Aerodynamic and light. 
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Helical Fletching

perks.description:
Feather-light with good control.
  •  Slightly decreases accuracy
  •  Greatly increases stability
perks.name: Natural Fletching

perks.description:
Modern fletching for straight paths. 
  •  Increases accuracy
perks.name: Straight Fletching

perks.description: Final blows grant increased mobility, weapon range, and handling for a short duration.
perks.name: Killing Wind

perks.description: Aiming this weapon for a short period reduces flinch.
perks.name: No Distractions

perks.description: Increased movement speed and target acquisition when moving while aiming down sights.
perks.name: Moving Target

perks.description: Rapid precision hits temporarily increase stability and reload speed.
perks.name: Rapid Hit

perks.description: This weapon can be drawn unbelievably fast.
perks.name: Quickdraw

perks.description: Increases handling, reload speed, and stability for each fully charged ability.
perks.name: Surplus

perks.description: Rapidly defeating targets triggers health regeneration. Guardians and powerful combatants count as more than one kill.
perks.name: Unrelenting

perks.description: Reloading after a final blow also reloads stowed weapons.
perks.name: Sympathetic Arsenal

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage from melee kills and kills with this weapon.
perks.name: Swashbuckler

perks.description: Aiming this weapon increases its effective range and zoom magnification. Increased projectile velocity while aiming Rocket Launchers, Grenade Launchers, and Bows.
perks.name: Rangefinder

perks.description: Arrows explode after a short delay.
perks.name: Explosive Head

perks.description: Faster time to aim down sights.
perks.name: Snapshot Sights
